docs.title: Welcome to PurpleCube Help Center!
docs.text: Open one of the pages below to get help in answering your questions. You can search user guides and community portal or raise product issues and questions through the support desk.

docs.title: 📘 Guides & Documentation
docs.text:
• Purplecube Guide Find out the details about PurpleCube's architecture, installation and usage.

  • Purplecube Manager Guide Find out the details about PurpleCube Manager’s architecture, installation and usage.

docs.title: 🎬 Learning Resources
docs.text:
• Tutorial Videos Access the library of PurpleCube tutorial videos.

  • Release Notes New features, enhancements and fixes.

docs.title: 💬 Community & Support
docs.text:
• Community Post your questions, follow discussions and share your knowledge.

  • Support Desk Contact us for any issues, usability questions and enhancement requests.

docs.title: 📣 Announcements
docs.text: • Announcements Latest updates on PurpleCube releases and support.
